title: Check the Cache
content:
Why aren’t Typophile thread images cached (or at least place-held)  
by the browser? Like every time I load up page 2 of the CT thread  
it takes forever to be able to read/do anything, because the images  
are loading up and being placed and things jump-step down furiously  
for a long time.

hhp

 [‹ Any utilities for OS X that check kerning pairs?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208042931/http:/typophile.com/node/19148 "Go to previous forum topic") [How is body size determined for fonts? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208042931/http:/typophile.com/node/19130 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hrant
